    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Entwined Energy Ki](/Feats.aspx?ID=2692) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Fists of the Ruby Phoenix</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island](/Sources.aspx?ID=85) pg. 74</row>

</column>

---

You can transform your inner power into a type of energy to empower your ki abilities. When you gain this feat, choose either acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage. When you cast [_ki blast_](/Spells.aspx?ID=484), you can choose to have the spell deal the type of damage you chose instead of force damage. When you cast [_ki form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=738) or [_ki strike_](/Spells.aspx?ID=486), add the type of damage you chose to the list of damage types you can select for the spell.

**Special** At the GM's discretion, this feat can alter other ki spells.

<title level="2">Feats</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island](/Sources.aspx?ID=85) pg. 74</row>

The player characters might learn some of these techniques from friends and rivals during their stay on Bonmu, allowing them to select the feats the next time they would gain a feat. Surviving combat against Syu Tak-nwa allows the characters to take the three witch feats, while defeating or impressing the Ahmoza twins allows them to take Entwined Energy Ki. Lighting the candles and praying in the temple of Irori's prayer room (area A8) gives them access to Wronged Monk's Wrath.

**Related Feats**: [Syu Tak-Nwa's Deadly Hair](/Feats.aspx?ID=2690), [Syu Tak-Nwa's Hexed Locks](/Feats.aspx?ID=2691), [Syu Tak-Nwa's Skillful Tresses](/Feats.aspx?ID=2689), [Wronged Monk's Wrath](/Feats.aspx?ID=2693)
